sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { TranslateService } from '@ngx-translate/core'; import { NavigationService } from 'src/app/navigation.service'; import * as json from 'data.json'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.scss'] }) export class HeaderComponent { constructor (private translateservice : TranslateService){ translateservice.setDefaultLang('es'); } switchEnglish(language: string){ this.translateservice.use(language) } switchSpain(language: string){ this.translateservice.use(language) } switchCatala(language: string){ this.translateservice.use(language) } es = json; }
  • Castellano
  • Català
  • English
